managementSubscriptionId.description: The GUID of the subscription which is holding management resources.

companyShort.description: The shortcut representing the company part in resource names.

isRoot.description: Defines if this is the root .azcontext so the searcher will not search up the tree.

forceContext.description: Defines if the context will be set in any case to the tenant and subscription provided here.

adminEntraGroupName.description: The name of the Entra security group which represents elevated users in PIM.

cspServicePrincipalId.description: Optional id of the CSP service principle.

subscriptionsToIgnore.description: An optional array of subscription ids which should be ignored by CAF scripts.

managementGroupsToIgnore.description: An optional array of management group ids which should be ignored by CAF scripts.

managementAssetsPath.description: The relative path to access Bicep or Terraform resources needed for CAF-enablement.
